intro: Hi, I'm Eduardo, Full-stack Developer. This is my portfolio where I showcase my projects and services.

works.title: Development in Python, Java, C++
works.details: I have experience in developing applications using Python, Java, and C++. I have worked on projects ranging from simple scripts to more complex applications.

works.title: Web Development
works.details: I am proficient in full-stack web development, with skills ranging from creating attractive and highly functional web pages and landing pages. My experience in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript is complemented by a mastery of popular libraries and frameworks such as React and Django.

works.title: Desktop Application Development
works.details: In addition to web development, I also have experience in desktop application development using Tkinter in Python. I have created applications with graphical user interfaces (GUI) and (CRUD) with DB for various needs.

works.title: Database Development
works.details: With solid experience in databases like MySQL, SQLite, etc., I am able to create reliable and efficient data storage systems. From web applications to business solutions, my knowledge in databases ensures optimal information management in every project.
